about_the_game:
From the studio behind Gremlins, Inc. and the game designer of Graveyard Keeper comes a story of friendship and betrayal set in the dying world of Rund. The magic powers of Kaira, the lead character, are exceptional – yet her mission will require more than that. It's hard to tell an ally from an enemy when the reality itself has two different sides...


  • Explore the world, crossing between the two realms of Rund.

  • Prevail in the turn-based battles, combining weapons, magic and alchemy.

  • Develop the party by leveling up and discovering new spells and recipes.

  • Craft and concoct, creating weapons, equipment, alchemy and magic crystals.

  • Engage in the adventures, exploring the secrets of the two realms of Rund.


The game has multiple layers of different mechanics that combine for replayability, and will challenge you with dozens of encounters in the story and the challenge modes!

short_description: Sister of a Dragon is a turn-based tactics about a mage who tries to help her friend, but ends up destroying the world. Fight monsters by combining weapons, magic and alchemy on a hex-based matrix. Craft, explore and develop party in the story mode. Battle through duels in the challenge mode.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain
